mapper.sql: t.user_id, t.user_name, t.real_name, t.age, t.gender, t.last_login_time, t.is_active
mapper.insert: insert into su_user (user_id, user_name, real_name, age, gender, last_login_time, is_active) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update su_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
